source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Writing a Fiction Novel For Beginners
items.headline: Part 1
objectives_summary: Will learn the basic core structure of writing
Basic preparation to build confidence in a novice student
Have the know how to write

items.title: Podcasting: Recording and Publishing Your Podcast
items.headline: Learn to make your own podcast with stunning audio clarity that competes with your favorite podcasts!
objectives_summary: How to get the best recording in any conditions.
How to record a podcast with people in multiple locations.
How to get reduce noise in your recordings.

items.title: CREATIVE CONFIDENCE
items.headline: Cultivate a creative mindset and boost your confidence to execute ideas into action. Unleash your CREATIVE CONFIDENCE
objectives_summary: How to cultivate a creative mindset
From idea to action
Creative tools for generating ideas

items.title: GO EXPLORE - From Raw Concept to an Exciting Vision
items.headline: Writers, Designers, Developers, Artists: the do's and don't of turning a great IDEA into a personal MISSION.
objectives_summary: Create your next work with excitement and confidence, instead of fear and confusion.
Juice up your work with a new level of finesse, texture and details.
Balance your FLOW and your STRUCTURE better than ever.

items.title: Ultimate Pen and Ink Drawing: Plus Color!
items.headline: Learn how to draw with ink step-by-step
objectives_summary: Which inking tool suits your style best
Popular pen & ink techniques like Crosshatching, Hatching, Stippling, and Washes
How to ink on paper & ink digitally on Photoshop

items.title: How to Write Space Opera (SF Sisters)

visible_instructors.name: Harry
visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.
visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf

items.headline: One of a matched pair of courses in writing "classic" science fiction.
objectives_summary: Conceive, write and perfect a Space Opera novel

items.title: Voice Over auditioning - Tips and tricks to improve bookings

visible_instructors.name: Mike
visible_instructors.job_title: Voice Actor, Audio producer, Voice Over coach
visible_instructors.title: Mike Elmore

items.headline: Winning the audition
objectives_summary: Improve Booking to Audition ratio utilizing tips and tricks during the process

items.title: Developing video story-lines
items.headline: This course takes you through the process of developing ideas through to creating an animatic for a promotional video.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to generate ideas for a video through to scripting, storyboarding and producing an animatic.

In this course, you will  learn techniques in story development, types of shots used in the language of film; how to write a script; how to draw a storyboard using Photoshop; and how to create an animatic using Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere and After Effects. You will also compare the animatic to the finished promo to consider cost implications.

items.title: Digital watercolor florals with Procreate
items.headline: How to mimic traditional watercolor with digital brushes
objectives_summary: How to paint digitally like traditional watercolor
How to mimic traditional watercolor

items.title: Creative Problem Solving
items.headline: This course will help you to become a master problem solver.   We cover the process of becoming a problem solving master
objectives_summary: Learn the process of creative problem solving
Learn what a problem is
Learn techniques of creative problem solving

items.title: How To Sketch Like An Artist
items.headline: The One Day Course That Will Make You An Artist Tonight
objectives_summary: Become an artist in one day
Create a finished piece of artwork that they can give as a gift to someone
Create a finished piece of artwork that they can hang on their wall

items.title: Theatre for Kids - Basics
items.headline: Theatre-Confidence-Focus-Stage Presence-Communication-Acting-Social Skills-Fun
objectives_summary: Students here are aged from 7 years to 11 years looking to explore themselves in Theatre and Acting. They will learn basics of Theatre, Imitation, Acting, Emotions and have loads of fun with the activities. Most of the activities are designed to keep them occupied on their own. And they can work together with friends and family if they feel like anytime.

items.title: Sketching and drawing: 5 Techniques to improve your skills

visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer
visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe

items.headline: Learn 5 drawing techniques used by the professionals
objectives_summary: Sketch and draw with confidence.
Express your ideas graphically and fearlessly.
Choose a style and medium that suits you perfectly.

items.title: How To Write A Book In 2 Weeks
items.headline: Go from idea conception to final draft quickly with the help of a serial author
objectives_summary: Write the book that they've always wanted to
Get their book published
How to think creatively about the type of book they could write

items.title: Creative Writing Bootcamp
items.headline: A crash course in the storyteller's craft
objectives_summary: You'll sharpen your writing and storytelling skills.
We'll study all the elements of the story, from character creation, to setting time and place, plot development and writing with style.

items.title: Skool of Creativity
items.headline: Become a more effective and innovative thinker and make a real creative change in your life and work.
objectives_summary: Understand the creative process and role of the left and right brain
Overcome rigid thinking patterns
Recognise what holds back your own creativity and generate movement to get unstuck
